definition: belonging to or characteristic of Romanticism or the Romantic Movement in the arts, an artist of the Romantic Movement or someone influenced by Romanticism
details:
adjective
- belonging to or characteristic of Romanticism or the Romantic Movement in the arts
= synonyms: romanticistic
noun
- an artist of the Romantic Movement or someone influenced by Romanticism
= synonyms: romantic
- someone who indulges in excessive sentimentality
= synonyms: sentimentalist
